page.title: 11AN HISTORIC EVENT
page.content: In the townland of Ballyarnet,an event occured which was to have great historical significance.In 1932 a small, single engined aeroplane landed in a field at Ballyarnet. Out stepped a young woman,the famous Amelia Earhart.She had set off from America, and 13hrs later,landed in a field at Springfield, on land owned by a Mr.Gallagher.It was due to a faulty compass that she landed near Derry,as she had intended landing in Paris.The event at that time was recorded widely in the National and Local newspapers. Many photographs of Amelia show children who today have vivid memories of the event.This field is marked today by a monument erected in 1982 to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the 1st solo flight over the Atlantic by a woman.
